attributes.action: Establish Monument Memorial for commemorate Woman's civil courage on Parliament Square
attributes.additional_details: The reason why I apply for establish this monument is because we all need today good example and good moral ethical attitude  We got erossion of it everywhere in society coming out especially from media  Young people can learn from live of this womans like Anne Frank Sophie Scholl Irena Sendler  or Anna Poliatkovska  They represented also freedom of individuals freedom of speech They good example for further generations and wide recognizable By hers live they earn to be on central place They also represent idea of Europe Please accept this positive idea to create such a memorial
